channel.title: InsidiaX Torva Effect Help!
channel.description: Does anyone know how to add the torva effect to insidiax?

item.title: InsidiaX Torva Effect Help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

In whichever class handles equipping/removing items.

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX Torva Effect Help!
item.dc:creator: @cmancongv cmancongv
item.description:
@cmancongv wrote:

where do you put it

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:416506”]You’re probably looking for something like:

[code=Java]
public void equip(final Item item) {
// normal input validation
switch (item.getId()) {
case torvaChest:
maxHealth += 200;
break;

    case torvaLegs:
        maxHealth += 134;
        break;

    case torvaHelm:
        maxHealth += 66;
        break;
}

}

public void unequip(final Item item) {
// normal input validation
switch (item.getId()) {
case torvaChest:
maxHealth -= 200;
break;

    case torvaLegs:
        maxHealth -= 134;
        break;

    case torvaHelm:
        maxHealth -= 66;
        break;
}

}
[/code][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX Torva Effect Help!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

totalystylin1:

hahahhahaha. tht’s y u need to learn how to code. i’ve coded this for 2 months, with 100 - 150 ppl on at a time. no complaints.

The day PI hold 150 players is the day Jagex releases their source code.

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX Torva Effect Help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You’re probably looking for something like:

public void equip(final Item item) {
    // normal input validation
    switch (item.getId()) {
        case torvaChest:
            maxHealth += 200;
            break;

        case torvaLegs:
            maxHealth += 134;
            break;

        case torvaHelm:
            maxHealth += 66;
            break;
    }
}

public void unequip(final Item item) {
    // normal input validation
    switch (item.getId()) {
        case torvaChest:
            maxHealth -= 200;
            break;

        case torvaLegs:
            maxHealth -= 134;
            break;

        case torvaHelm:
            maxHealth -= 66;
            break;
    }
}

Does anyone know how to add the torva effect to insidiax?
